us.description:
Train your brain to listen carefully with this professional speech therapy app. Three activities help you to understand sentences, follow directions, and improve language processing. If you’re looking for a speech therapy app for adults and older children with communication and cognitive impairments that takes understanding beyond single words, this app is for you. 

** Try for FREE by downloading Advanced Language Therapy Lite **

Advanced Comprehension Therapy will help you find where comprehension breaks down, then help you build it back up with 3 classic speech therapy activities targeting sentence-level listening and reading comprehension.

1) IDENTIFY the picture that matches the sentence, increasing in syntactic complexity. Start by finding the picture that matches a sentence like “The baby sleeps.” Work up to finding “The grandparent is told a secret by the child” from closely related pictures.

* 11 levels of difficulty for understanding sentences with nearly 700 unique trials
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes up to 3 nouns, indirect objects, reversible sentences, & passives

2) BUILD a sentence by focusing on each word & how they all fit together. Arrange the words one-by-one to match the pictured sentence you hear. Start with 3 words and work up to 9.

* 20 sentence types in nearly 1200 unique trials
* Add up to 3 extra words for an added challenge
* Tricky "little words" like articles, pronouns, and prepositions
* Hear each word as you touch it

3) FOLLOW directions of increasing difficulty in 1-, 2-, & 3-step commands. Start with exercises like “Touch the pencil.” Work up to brain-bending challenges like “Before you touch the large yellow striped circle, touch the small blue solid star.” 

* 16 levels of difficulty for following directions
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes basic, temporal, & conditional commands in a hierarchy of 1-, 2-, & 3-step directions

In All Activities:

* Enjoy 1000’s of unique stimuli with hundreds of photos
* Use hints when you get stuck so you always finish successfully
* Track progress with detailed e-mail reports 
* Record yourself on-screen and send it when you’re finished
* Repeat audio at any time, or repeat slowly for easier understanding
* Designed with adults in mind but easy enough for children to use 
* No subscriptions, no monthly bills, no Wi-Fi needed

-------------------------------------------------
Who is Advanced Comprehension Therapy For?

* Speech-Language Pathologists
* Adults with Aphasia (mild-moderate)
* Stroke & TBI Survivors
* Children with Autism or Language Learning Difficulties
* Anyone who has mastered the single words in Comprehension Therapy or Language 4-in-1 & wants to take their therapy to the next level!

-------------------------------------------------
Which Skills Does This App Target?

* Auditory Comprehension (listening)
* Reading Comprehension 
* Attention to Detail
* Working Memory (holding information)
* Nouns & Pronouns (he/she/it/they)
* Adjectives (colors, size, shading)
* Syntactic Processing (understanding grammar)
* Temporal Concepts (before/after)
* Conditional Directions (if/then)
* Problem Solving (using hint/repeat or fixing errors)

-------------------------------------------------
Download now to get started – or try it for FREE with Advanced Language Therapy Lite!

Looking for something different in a speech therapy app? We offer a wide range to choose from. Find the right one for you at tactustherapy.com/find

us.description:
Pro Camera by Moment is the manual camera app that gives you full creative control and professional-level performance, all at an affordable price. It brings us closer to what we love about our DSLR and mirrorless cameras – exposure controls, precise focus, rich colors, smooth video, crisp audio – without being complicated.

If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use camera app, Pro Camera is for you. We make it fast and intuitive to switch between modes, dial in your shot, and keep shooting. Plus, we give you all the manual controls you’ll need: shutter speed, ISO, white balance, focus, and more. Your favorite settings can be saved and recalled on demand.

For filmmakers – the features you need, not the ones you don’t. LUTs, color spaces, bitrates, dual-channel audio meters, real-time waveforms, fast access to frame rates, and more.

For photographers – easier than shooting on your DSLR. Shoot in RAW (even in bursts), capture brackets, and more. You can even create stunning timelapses and light trail effects (in-app purchase required). 

For everyone else – inspired by the pros we made the interface simple, fast, and easy to use. We provide getting started tips, video tutorials, and full-time customer service to get you set up.

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

GENERAL FEATURES
+ Full manual: control shutter speed, iso, exposure, focus, and white balance with easy-to-use sliders
+ Focus peaking: manually dial in your focus using highlighted in-focus regions
+ Zebra stripes: quickly determine over- and under-exposed areas in the viewfinder
+ Split focus and exposure: take control of tricky lighting scenarios
+ Viewfinder grid: choose from thirds, square, and golden ratio
+ Gyroscope: ensure your shot is level with an on-screen gyroscope and haptic feedback

PHOTOGRAPHY FEATURES
+ RAW and TIFF: shoot photos in RAW/ProRAW format for better editing, or TIFF for high-quality printing
+ RAW+JPG option: simultaneously get the best of both worlds
+ Burst mode: capture burst shots in RAW format – capture action while maintaining the uncompressed quality pros want with RAW
+ Bracketing: capture multiple exposures to stack later in your favorite editing apps

FILMMAKER FEATURES
+ Import, organize, and use your favorite LUTs
+ Color spaces: choose between Rec.709, Rec.2020 HDR, Display P3, and Apple Log (on compatible devices)
+ Codecs: shoot in HEVC, H.264, or any of the 422 ProRes variants
+ Video bitrates: get precise control over video quality with standard, medium, and high bitrate options
+ RGB histogram: dial in your video color, balance, and exposure
+ Waveform monitor: evaluate video brightness and exposure across your shot in real time
+ Audio meters: get just the right sound levels with real-time, precise, dual-channel audio levels
+ HDMI clean feed output: preview on a bigger screen
+ Video stabilization: make your videos buttery smooth
+ Video formats: change your resolution and frame rate on screen, without digging into a settings menu
+ Anamorphic: use the Moment Anamorphic lens to shoot amazing, letterbox style photos and videos, with a de-squeeze option built in

PREMIUM FEATURES (In-App Purchases)
+ Timelapse mode: capture stunning time-lapse videos
+ Slow Shutter mode: long exposure shots with motion blur or light trails

WORKS WITH
+ iPhone 16 Camera Control: get quick access to manual settings
+ Lens control: manually control which of the triple/dual lenses you want to shoot with so you can use Moment lenses over each one
+ Moment lenses: access options like anamorphic de-squeeze and distortion correction
+ Moment battery case: works with the DSLR-like shutter button on our photography cases for half-press and full-press capture. Take better photos, faster.
+ Apple Watch: use your watch as a remote to shoot photos or record videos
+ Siri Shortcuts: quick access to capture a photo or start a video

us.description:
SessionBand Jazz Fusion – Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition

Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the world’s only chord-based loop app.

With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists.

Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others.

For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea – Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne – Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...).

Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles!

Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier.

Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks.

Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com

The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music:

• Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles
• Choose your chords
• Stretch or shorten loops
• Build up your track in minutes
• Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos
• Auto-transpose your entire track
• Add FX
• Mix your track
• Adjust track tempo
• Record direct to audio
• Copy straight to other music apps
• Share with the world!

The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians:

• Practice with your own world-class band
• Loop markers let you focus on specific sections
• Mute instrument channels as you like
• Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly
• 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos
• Transpose your whole track instantly

You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free!

• Simple, intuitive interface
• Audition the loop you are about to insert
• ‘Track Builder’ allows simple creation of a full track
• Intuitive mixing and record functions

Detailed Product Information:

Volume 4 is the ultimate jazz play-along and the perfect tool for jazz songwriters. And we have added loads of extra features and tech improvements since Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Here's what you get:

For this long-awaited edition, we have gone back to mostly classic jazz with a couple of contemporary styles. Among the classics, expect to hear medium, post-bop Wayne Shorter swing styles in four and three, plus Wes Montgomery and Ahmad Jamal-inspired up-tempo swing styles. tr.description:
Window seat or aisle? Booth or table? Lone wolf or life of the party? In Is This Seat Taken?, your mission is to organize groups of people according to their preferences. It’s a cozy, no-pressure logic puzzle game where you’re in charge of who sits where.

Whether it’s the cinema, a crowded bus, a wedding reception, or a cramped taxi cab, every setting introduces new characters with specific tastes. A party guest with a sensitive nose won’t be happy sitting next to a stranger who’s wearing too much cologne. A sleepy passenger won’t be happy trying to nap on the bus next to someone listening to loud music. It’s all about reading the room to find the perfect placement!

Nat is an aspiring actor whose world gets turned upside down when they see a shape just like them on the big screen. This discovery sends Nat on a global journey to meet their hero and figure out how to fit in. Experience Nat's heartfelt story as you travel from city to city, each with its own levels, characters, and charm.

- Play seating matchmaker to please picky characters.
- Discover each character’s unique traits—relatable, outlandish, and everything in between.
- Piece together satisfying puzzles with no timers or leaderboards.
- Unlock fun new scenarios as you progress—from bus rides to banquets!

tr.description:
Incredibox lets you create your own music with the help of a merry crew of beatboxers. Choose your musical style to start laying down, recording and sharing your mix. Get your groove on with hip-hop beats, electro waves, pop voices, jazzy swing, Brazilian rhythms and much more. As well, discover a selection of mods created by the community. Plenty to keep you mixing for hours, with no ads or microtransactions.

Part game, part tool, Incredibox is above all an audio and visual experience that has quickly become a hit with people of all ages. The right mix of music, graphics, animation and interactivity makes Incredibox ideal for everyone. And because it makes learning fun and entertaining, Incredibox is now being used by schools all over the world.

How to play? Easy! Drag and drop icons onto the avatars to make them sing and start to compose your own music. Find the right sound combos to unlock animated choruses that will enhance your tune.

Once your composition sounds great, just save it and share it to get as many votes as possible. If you get enough votes, you may go down in Incredibox history by joining the Top 50 chart! Ready to show your stuff?

You can also download your mix as an MP3 from the app and listen to it over and over again!

Too lazy to create your own mix? No problem, just let the automatic mode play for you!

Pump it up and chill ;)

****************
Incredibox, the brainchild of Lyon, France-based studio So Far So Good, was created in 2009. Starting out as a webpage, it was then released as a mobile and tablet app and became an instant hit. It has won several awards and appeared in various international media, including: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx and many others. The online demo has attracted more than 100 million visitors since its creation.

【Game Introduction】
'Call of Knights' is an RPG card pixel-style game developed by Olive Panda Studio. It is divided into two parts: 'Song of the Knight' and 'Shining Stars,' each offering unique gameplay and content. The game adopts paid download, in-app purchase to unlock model to access all gameplay content.

【In-App Purchases Unlock】
Full Content Unlock: $8.99 USD
Story Mode of Song of the Knight: $4.99 USD
Free Mode of Shining Stars: $4.99 USD
Both modes support experiencing before paying for unlocking. 'Song of the Knight' can be experienced for free until the end of the second chapter, and 'Shining Stars' offers free gameplay for one year. 
Note: The amounts will be converted based on the local exchange rate.

'Song of the Knight':
The story is adapted from the Nobel Prize-winning author Henrik Hien's 'The Knights of the Cross.' The main gameplay involves RPG role-playing with cards, incorporating a partner skill combo system during card battles. Different cards played release exclusive skills, constructing various playstyles. Players will also meet and recruit numerous companions, embarking on an epic journey.

'Shining Stars':
The game is set in a magical continent called Antana, featuring six countries with diverse customs. Players take on the role of a small lord in one of the kingdoms. As the demonic realm is about to invade the continent, players must travel far and wide to find companions for their knightly order, establish their own knightly order, embark on adventures, strengthen their abilities, and defend the human frontlines.

【Device Support】
· iOS 10.0 and above
· Operating memory of 3GB and above
· iPhone 7 and above
· iPad Air 3 and above

【Contact Us】
If you need assistance during the game or encounter issues, feel free to contact us via email.
Official Email: knight@longyougame.com

tr.description:
Train your brain to listen carefully with this professional speech therapy app. Three activities help you to understand sentences, follow directions, and improve language processing. If you’re looking for a speech therapy app for adults and older children with communication and cognitive impairments that takes understanding beyond single words, this app is for you. 

** Try for FREE by downloading Advanced Language Therapy Lite **

Advanced Comprehension Therapy will help you find where comprehension breaks down, then help you build it back up with 3 classic speech therapy activities targeting sentence-level listening and reading comprehension.

1) IDENTIFY the picture that matches the sentence, increasing in syntactic complexity. Start by finding the picture that matches a sentence like “The baby sleeps.” Work up to finding “The grandparent is told a secret by the child” from closely related pictures.

* 11 levels of difficulty for understanding sentences with nearly 700 unique trials
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes up to 3 nouns, indirect objects, reversible sentences, & passives

2) BUILD a sentence by focusing on each word & how they all fit together. Arrange the words one-by-one to match the pictured sentence you hear. Start with 3 words and work up to 9.

* 20 sentence types in nearly 1200 unique trials
* Add up to 3 extra words for an added challenge
* Tricky "little words" like articles, pronouns, and prepositions
* Hear each word as you touch it

3) FOLLOW directions of increasing difficulty in 1-, 2-, & 3-step commands. Start with exercises like “Touch the pencil.” Work up to brain-bending challenges like “Before you touch the large yellow striped circle, touch the small blue solid star.” 

* 16 levels of difficulty for following directions
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes basic, temporal, & conditional commands in a hierarchy of 1-, 2-, & 3-step directions

In All Activities:

* Enjoy 1000’s of unique stimuli with hundreds of photos
* Use hints when you get stuck so you always finish successfully
* Track progress with detailed e-mail reports 
* Record yourself on-screen and send it when you’re finished
* Repeat audio at any time, or repeat slowly for easier understanding
* Designed with adults in mind but easy enough for children to use 
* No subscriptions, no monthly bills, no Wi-Fi needed

-------------------------------------------------
Who is Advanced Comprehension Therapy For?

* Speech-Language Pathologists
* Adults with Aphasia (mild-moderate)
* Stroke & TBI Survivors
* Children with Autism or Language Learning Difficulties
* Anyone who has mastered the single words in Comprehension Therapy or Language 4-in-1 & wants to take their therapy to the next level!

-------------------------------------------------
Which Skills Does This App Target?

* Auditory Comprehension (listening)
* Reading Comprehension 
* Attention to Detail
* Working Memory (holding information)
* Nouns & Pronouns (he/she/it/they)
* Adjectives (colors, size, shading)
* Syntactic Processing (understanding grammar)
* Temporal Concepts (before/after)
* Conditional Directions (if/then)
* Problem Solving (using hint/repeat or fixing errors)

-------------------------------------------------
Download now to get started – or try it for FREE with Advanced Language Therapy Lite!

Looking for something different in a speech therapy app? We offer a wide range to choose from. Find the right one for you at tactustherapy.com/find

tr.description:
Pro Camera by Moment is the manual camera app that gives you full creative control and professional-level performance, all at an affordable price. It brings us closer to what we love about our DSLR and mirrorless cameras – exposure controls, precise focus, rich colors, smooth video, crisp audio – without being complicated.

If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use camera app, Pro Camera is for you. We make it fast and intuitive to switch between modes, dial in your shot, and keep shooting. Plus, we give you all the manual controls you’ll need: shutter speed, ISO, white balance, focus, and more. Your favorite settings can be saved and recalled on demand.

For filmmakers – the features you need, not the ones you don’t. LUTs, color spaces, bitrates, dual-channel audio meters, real-time waveforms, fast access to frame rates, and more.

For photographers – easier than shooting on your DSLR. Shoot in RAW (even in bursts), capture brackets, and more. You can even create stunning timelapses and light trail effects (in-app purchase required). 

For everyone else – inspired by the pros we made the interface simple, fast, and easy to use. We provide getting started tips, video tutorials, and full-time customer service to get you set up.

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

GENERAL FEATURES
+ Full manual: control shutter speed, iso, exposure, focus, and white balance with easy-to-use sliders
+ Focus peaking: manually dial in your focus using highlighted in-focus regions
+ Zebra stripes: quickly determine over- and under-exposed areas in the viewfinder
+ Split focus and exposure: take control of tricky lighting scenarios
+ Viewfinder grid: choose from thirds, square, and golden ratio
+ Gyroscope: ensure your shot is level with an on-screen gyroscope and haptic feedback

PHOTOGRAPHY FEATURES
+ RAW and TIFF: shoot photos in RAW/ProRAW format for better editing, or TIFF for high-quality printing
+ RAW+JPG option: simultaneously get the best of both worlds
+ Burst mode: capture burst shots in RAW format – capture action while maintaining the uncompressed quality pros want with RAW
+ Bracketing: capture multiple exposures to stack later in your favorite editing apps

FILMMAKER FEATURES
+ Import, organize, and use your favorite LUTs
+ Color spaces: choose between Rec.709, Rec.2020 HDR, Display P3, and Apple Log (on compatible devices)
+ Codecs: shoot in HEVC, H.264, or any of the 422 ProRes variants
+ Video bitrates: get precise control over video quality with standard, medium, and high bitrate options
+ RGB histogram: dial in your video color, balance, and exposure
+ Waveform monitor: evaluate video brightness and exposure across your shot in real time
+ Audio meters: get just the right sound levels with real-time, precise, dual-channel audio levels
+ HDMI clean feed output: preview on a bigger screen
+ Video stabilization: make your videos buttery smooth
+ Video formats: change your resolution and frame rate on screen, without digging into a settings menu
+ Anamorphic: use the Moment Anamorphic lens to shoot amazing, letterbox style photos and videos, with a de-squeeze option built in

PREMIUM FEATURES (In-App Purchases)
+ Timelapse mode: capture stunning time-lapse videos
+ Slow Shutter mode: long exposure shots with motion blur or light trails

WORKS WITH
+ iPhone 16 Camera Control: get quick access to manual settings
+ Lens control: manually control which of the triple/dual lenses you want to shoot with so you can use Moment lenses over each one
+ Moment lenses: access options like anamorphic de-squeeze and distortion correction
+ Moment battery case: works with the DSLR-like shutter button on our photography cases for half-press and full-press capture. Take better photos, faster.
+ Apple Watch: use your watch as a remote to shoot photos or record videos
+ Siri Shortcuts: quick access to capture a photo or start a video

After a devastating earthquake strikes Istanbul, can you find the woman you love?

In a fully hand-drawn Istanbul, embark on a journey that tests your instincts and hopes. After the earthquake, you must cross the city — from Bakırköy to Üsküdar — to find the woman you love.

Explore a hand-drawn, post-quake Istanbul — from shattered historic neighborhoods to the edge of the Bosphorus. Every corner hides new stories and challenges. In the heart of chaos, survival is not enough. You must do it without losing your honor.

On your journey to save your girlfriend, you’ll face not only physical obstacles but also emotional and psychological trials. The people you meet among the ruins—and their stories—will push you to make difficult moral choices.

To move forward, you’ll need to solve puzzles, crack safe codes, pick locks, explore devastated locations, and manage your energy wisely.

Quakeline is more than just a game; it is a project that aims to raise awareness about the possible impact of a real earthquake in Istanbul. Through its fictional yet grounded narrative, the game invites players to reflect on survival, resilience, and the human spirit.

Witness the struggle to survive—and the power of hope.
In this unforgettable journey, you’ll not only navigate through debris but also discover the deepest and purest parts of what it means to be human.

pt.description:
Prefere sentar na janela ou no corredor? Quer a mesa de canto? Você é a alma da festa ou quer só curtir na sua? Em Is This Seat Taken?, sua missão é organizar grupos de pessoas de acordo com as preferências de cada um. É um jogo de quebra-cabeças lógico, confortável e sem pressão, no qual você decide quem senta onde.

Seja no cinema, em um ônibus cheio, em uma festa de casamento ou em um táxi lotado, cada cenário traz personagens novos com gostos específicos. Um dos convidados pode ter um nariz sensível e não vai gostar de sentar perto de um estranho usando perfume forte. Um dos passageiros está com sono e vai odiar tentar dormir ao lado de alguém ouvindo música alta. Você vai ter que analisar tudo isso e encontrar os lugares perfeitos!

Nat sempre quis fazer filmes. Sua vida vira de pernas para o ar quando vê uma forma igual à sua na telona. Essa descoberta levará Nat a uma viagem pelo mundo para encontrar sua estrela preferida e descobrir como se encaixar nesse mundo. Siga a aventura emocionante de Nat viajando de cidade em cidade, cada uma com suas próprias fases, personagens e charme.

- Você é responsável por acomodar essas figuras cheias de caprichos.
- Descubra as personalidades de cada um, sejam eles gente comum, gente bizarra ou algo no caminho.
- Resolva quebra-cabeças satisfatórios sem se preocupar com tempo ou placares.
- Desbloqueie novos cenários ao avançar no jogo, de viagens de ônibus até banquetes!

pt.description:
O Incredibox permite que você crie sua própria música com a ajuda de uma equipe divertida de beatboxers. Escolha seu estilo musical para começar a criar, gravar e compartilhar suas mixagens. Entre no ritmo com batidas de hip-hop, electro waves, vozes de pop, swing jazzy, ritmos brasileiros e muito mais. Além disso, descubra uma seleção de mods criados pela comunidade. Muita coisa para você mixar por horas, sem propagandas ou microtransações.

Parte jogo, parte ferramenta, o Incredibox é acima de tudo uma experiência audiovisual que se tornou um sucesso rapidamente entre pessoas de todas as idades. A combinação certa de música, gráficos, animação e interatividade torna o Incredibox ideal para todo mundo. E por tornar o aprendizado divertido e interessante, o Incredibox é usado por escolas no mundo inteiro.

Como jogar? Fácil! Arraste e solte ícones nos avatares para fazê-los cantar e comece a compor sua própria música. Encontre as combinações de sons certas para desbloquear refrões animados que vão aprimorar sua melodia.

Assim que sua composição estiver boa, basta salvá-la e compartilhar para conseguir o máximo de votos possível. Se você conseguir votos suficientes, poderá entrar para a história do Incredibox ao entrar no Top 50! Está pronto para mostrar seu talento?

É possível também baixar sua mixagem como MP3 no app e ouvi-la repetidamente!

Está com preguiça de criar sua própria mixagem? Sem problema, deixe o modo automático tocar por você!

Aumente o som e curta ;)

****************
Incredibox, criação do estúdio So Far So Good, com sede em Lyon, na França, foi criado em 2009. Começando como uma página da web, foi então lançado como um app para celular e tablet e se tornou um sucesso imediato. Ganhou vários prêmios e apareceu em diversas mídias internacionais, incluindo: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx e muitas outras. A demo online atraiu mais de 100 milhões de visitantes desde sua criação.

pt.description:
JANDARMA VE SAHİL GÜVENLİK PERSONEL SINAVI JSPS PRO

ŞİMDİ KAZANMA ZAMANI!!!

JSPS PRO, Jandarma ve Sahil Güvenlik personelinin astsubaylığa geçiş, ihtisas ve misyon koruma sınavlarına hazırlanması amacıyla geliştirilmiş, kapsamlı bir eğitim ve bilgi platformudur.
Ayrıca, görevdeki personelin jandarma mevzuat konularına her an erişebilmesini sağlayarak mesleki gelişime katkı sunar.

UYGULAMA ÖZELLİKLERİ

*Güncel Kanun ve Yönetmelikler
Uygulama içerisinde yer alan tüm mevzuat sürekli güncellenmektedir. Her konudan binlerce soru bulunmakta olup, soru sayıları düzenli olarak artırılmaktadır.

* Özet Anlatımlar
Zamanın Yoksa dert etme özetler ile hazırlanmaya başla.

*Video Dersler
JSPS sınavına yönelik uzman eğitmenler tarafından hazırlanmış video derslere erişim imkânı sunulmaktadır.

*Sesli Anlatım Özelliği
Konuları dilediğiniz yerde dinleyerek zamanınızı verimli kullanabilir ve öğrenme sürecinizi hızlandırabilirsiniz.

*Bilgi Kartları
JSPS için Pratik Yapın, Konu tekrarlarını kolaylaştıran, öğrenmeyi kalıcı hale getiren bilgi kartları yer almaktadır.

*Gerçek Sınav Formatında Denemeler
Uygulamada sınav formatına uygun 100 soruluk denemeler bulunmaktadır. Bu denemeler sınava hazırlıkta önemli bir avantaj sağlar.

*Sınav Takvimi ve Bildirimler
Sınav tarihleri, yapılması gereken işlemler ve güncel duyurular anlık bildirimlerle kullanıcıya iletilir.

*Yapay Zekâ Asistanı
Sınav konularıyla ilgili merak ettiğiniz soruları yöneltebileceğiniz yapay zekâ asistanı sınav emriyle aktif hale gelir ve sınırlı süreyle kullanılabilir.

*Favorilerim, Yapılacaklar, Haberler ve Bilgilendirme Alanları
Uygulama içerisinde kişisel çalışma planı oluşturabilir, ilerlemenizi takip edebilir ve güncel gelişmelerden haberdar olabilirsiniz.

JANDARMA VE SAHİL GÜVENLİK MESLEK BİLGİSİ MODÜLÜ

Bu modül, görev sırasında ihtiyaç duyulan tüm bilgilere tek platform üzerinden ulaşma imkânı sağlar.

Bu özellikler sayesinde personel, görev sırasında ihtiyaç duyduğu bilgilere kolayca ulaşabilir.

NEDEN JSPS PRO?

* Tüm kuvvet personelinin kullanabileceği en kapsamlı mobil uygulamadır.

pt.description:
【Game Introduction】
'Call of Knights' is an RPG card pixel-style game developed by Olive Panda Studio. It is divided into two parts: 'Song of the Knight' and 'Shining Stars,' each offering unique gameplay and content. The game adopts paid download, in-app purchase to unlock model to access all gameplay content.

【In-App Purchases Unlock】
Full Content Unlock: $8.99 USD
Story Mode of Song of the Knight: $4.99 USD
Free Mode of Shining Stars: $4.99 USD
Both modes support experiencing before paying for unlocking. 'Song of the Knight' can be experienced for free until the end of the second chapter, and 'Shining Stars' offers free gameplay for one year. 
Note: The amounts will be converted based on the local exchange rate.

'Song of the Knight':
The story is adapted from the Nobel Prize-winning author Henrik Hien's 'The Knights of the Cross.' The main gameplay involves RPG role-playing with cards, incorporating a partner skill combo system during card battles. Different cards played release exclusive skills, constructing various playstyles. Players will also meet and recruit numerous companions, embarking on an epic journey.

'Shining Stars':
The game is set in a magical continent called Antana, featuring six countries with diverse customs. Players take on the role of a small lord in one of the kingdoms. As the demonic realm is about to invade the continent, players must travel far and wide to find companions for their knightly order, establish their own knightly order, embark on adventures, strengthen their abilities, and defend the human frontlines.

【Device Support】
· iOS 10.0 and above
· Operating memory of 3GB and above
· iPhone 7 and above
· iPad Air 3 and above

【Contact Us】
If you need assistance during the game or encounter issues, feel free to contact us via email.
Official Email: knight@longyougame.com

pt.description:
Train your brain to listen carefully with this professional speech therapy app. Three activities help you to understand sentences, follow directions, and improve language processing. If you’re looking for a speech therapy app for adults and older children with communication and cognitive impairments that takes understanding beyond single words, this app is for you. 

** Try for FREE by downloading Advanced Language Therapy Lite **

Advanced Comprehension Therapy will help you find where comprehension breaks down, then help you build it back up with 3 classic speech therapy activities targeting sentence-level listening and reading comprehension.

1) IDENTIFY the picture that matches the sentence, increasing in syntactic complexity. Start by finding the picture that matches a sentence like “The baby sleeps.” Work up to finding “The grandparent is told a secret by the child” from closely related pictures.

* 11 levels of difficulty for understanding sentences with nearly 700 unique trials
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes up to 3 nouns, indirect objects, reversible sentences, & passives

2) BUILD a sentence by focusing on each word & how they all fit together. Arrange the words one-by-one to match the pictured sentence you hear. Start with 3 words and work up to 9.

* 20 sentence types in nearly 1200 unique trials
* Add up to 3 extra words for an added challenge
* Tricky "little words" like articles, pronouns, and prepositions
* Hear each word as you touch it

3) FOLLOW directions of increasing difficulty in 1-, 2-, & 3-step commands. Start with exercises like “Touch the pencil.” Work up to brain-bending challenges like “Before you touch the large yellow striped circle, touch the small blue solid star.” 

* 16 levels of difficulty for following directions
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes basic, temporal, & conditional commands in a hierarchy of 1-, 2-, & 3-step directions

In All Activities:

* Enjoy 1000’s of unique stimuli with hundreds of photos
* Use hints when you get stuck so you always finish successfully
* Track progress with detailed e-mail reports 
* Record yourself on-screen and send it when you’re finished
* Repeat audio at any time, or repeat slowly for easier understanding
* Designed with adults in mind but easy enough for children to use 
* No subscriptions, no monthly bills, no Wi-Fi needed

-------------------------------------------------
Who is Advanced Comprehension Therapy For?

* Speech-Language Pathologists
* Adults with Aphasia (mild-moderate)
* Stroke & TBI Survivors
* Children with Autism or Language Learning Difficulties
* Anyone who has mastered the single words in Comprehension Therapy or Language 4-in-1 & wants to take their therapy to the next level!

-------------------------------------------------
Which Skills Does This App Target?

* Auditory Comprehension (listening)
* Reading Comprehension 
* Attention to Detail
* Working Memory (holding information)
* Nouns & Pronouns (he/she/it/they)
* Adjectives (colors, size, shading)
* Syntactic Processing (understanding grammar)
* Temporal Concepts (before/after)
* Conditional Directions (if/then)
* Problem Solving (using hint/repeat or fixing errors)

-------------------------------------------------
Download now to get started – or try it for FREE with Advanced Language Therapy Lite!

Looking for something different in a speech therapy app? We offer a wide range to choose from. Find the right one for you at tactustherapy.com/find

pt.description:
Pro Camera by Moment is the manual camera app that gives you full creative control and professional-level performance, all at an affordable price. It brings us closer to what we love about our DSLR and mirrorless cameras – exposure controls, precise focus, rich colors, smooth video, crisp audio – without being complicated.

If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use camera app, Pro Camera is for you. We make it fast and intuitive to switch between modes, dial in your shot, and keep shooting. Plus, we give you all the manual controls you’ll need: shutter speed, ISO, white balance, focus, and more. Your favorite settings can be saved and recalled on demand.

For filmmakers – the features you need, not the ones you don’t. LUTs, color spaces, bitrates, dual-channel audio meters, real-time waveforms, fast access to frame rates, and more.

For photographers – easier than shooting on your DSLR. Shoot in RAW (even in bursts), capture brackets, and more. You can even create stunning timelapses and light trail effects (in-app purchase required). 

For everyone else – inspired by the pros we made the interface simple, fast, and easy to use. We provide getting started tips, video tutorials, and full-time customer service to get you set up.

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

GENERAL FEATURES
+ Full manual: control shutter speed, iso, exposure, focus, and white balance with easy-to-use sliders
+ Focus peaking: manually dial in your focus using highlighted in-focus regions
+ Zebra stripes: quickly determine over- and under-exposed areas in the viewfinder
+ Split focus and exposure: take control of tricky lighting scenarios
+ Viewfinder grid: choose from thirds, square, and golden ratio
+ Gyroscope: ensure your shot is level with an on-screen gyroscope and haptic feedback

PHOTOGRAPHY FEATURES
+ RAW and TIFF: shoot photos in RAW/ProRAW format for better editing, or TIFF for high-quality printing
+ RAW+JPG option: simultaneously get the best of both worlds
+ Burst mode: capture burst shots in RAW format – capture action while maintaining the uncompressed quality pros want with RAW
+ Bracketing: capture multiple exposures to stack later in your favorite editing apps

FILMMAKER FEATURES
+ Import, organize, and use your favorite LUTs
+ Color spaces: choose between Rec.709, Rec.2020 HDR, Display P3, and Apple Log (on compatible devices)
+ Codecs: shoot in HEVC, H.264, or any of the 422 ProRes variants
+ Video bitrates: get precise control over video quality with standard, medium, and high bitrate options
+ RGB histogram: dial in your video color, balance, and exposure
+ Waveform monitor: evaluate video brightness and exposure across your shot in real time
+ Audio meters: get just the right sound levels with real-time, precise, dual-channel audio levels
+ HDMI clean feed output: preview on a bigger screen
+ Video stabilization: make your videos buttery smooth
+ Video formats: change your resolution and frame rate on screen, without digging into a settings menu
+ Anamorphic: use the Moment Anamorphic lens to shoot amazing, letterbox style photos and videos, with a de-squeeze option built in

PREMIUM FEATURES (In-App Purchases)
+ Timelapse mode: capture stunning time-lapse videos

pt.description:
SessionBand Jazz Fusion – Tom Cawley Special Synth & Vintage Keys Edition

Create studio-quality Jazz Fusion tracks to your own chords in minutes with this special artist edition of the award-winning SessionBand app - the world’s only chord-based loop app.

With over 20,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops across 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles included, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great-sounding audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability. Perfect for songwriters and producers and the ultimate play-along for jazz rock and pop instrumentalists.

Highly acclaimed, multi award-winning pianist Tom Cawley is one of the most sought-after keyboard players in the world both as a jazz pianist (Dave Weckl, Jack DeJohnette, Charlie Watts, Jamie Cullum, Guy Barker...), and as a leading pop/rock keyboardist, recording and performing around the world with U2, Peter Gabriel, Andrea Bocelli, Amy Winehouse and many others.

For this special Jazz Fusion edition, Tom is joined by 2 of the world's top session musicians: Simon Lea – Drums (Rod Stewart, Dionne Warwick, James Blunt, James Morrison, Katie Melua...) and Geoff Gascoyne – Bass (Sting, Van Morrison, Georgie Fame...).

Tom's passion for jazz and for modern and vintage keys is reflected in the diverse range of styles in this edition. And Tom has employed many of the best keyboards from his vast personal collection: from the Oberheim OB-6, Prophet 12 and Moog Model D (as well as a modular set-up), to his vintage Fender Rhodes, Wurlitzer and Hohner Pianet - they all feature in the content of this app. And to do full justice to this genre, we have increased the number of chord variations to 15 for every root note in all 15 styles!

Alongside pro features like automated mixing, auto-transpose, one-touch live recording and a range of export functions, there are new tech features and upgrades like channel FX, instant PDF chord sheets and 'Track Builder' to make your track creation quicker and easier.

Create professional Jazz Fusion to your own choice of chords in minutes. Everything you need to create and share thousands of stunning royalty-free tracks.

Hear the results. Watch the video at sessionbandapp.com

The fastest way to create your own studio-quality music:

• Pick one of 15 Jazz Fusion styles
• Choose your chords
• Stretch or shorten loops
• Build up your track in minutes
• Instantly hear your track across different styles and tempos
• Auto-transpose your entire track
• Add FX
• Mix your track
• Adjust track tempo
• Record direct to audio
• Copy straight to other music apps
• Share with the world!

The ultimate mobile jam/practice tool for musicians:

• Practice with your own world-class band
• Loop markers let you focus on specific sections
• Mute instrument channels as you like
• Produce PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create...instantly
• 'Flip' your track across other styles and tempos
• Transpose your whole track instantly

You don't have to be a musician to create seriously good music and release it royalty-free!

• Simple, intuitive interface
• Audition the loop you are about to insert
• ‘Track Builder’ allows simple creation of a full track
• Intuitive mixing and record functions

Detailed Product Information:

• 15 diverse Jazz Fusion styles: Acoustic Rock; 70s Funk; Pop Rock; Neo Soul; Psychedelic Soul; 70s Soul; Jazz Rock; Disco Funk; Neo Classical; Latin Fusion; Indie Pop; Electro Pop; Electro Jazz; DnB; Groovy Six Four
• Tempos from 60bpm to 200bpm
• 15 chord variations for every root note: maj; maj7; maj7(#11); 11; 7; 7(b9); 7(#9,#5); 7(#11); min; m(#5); m7(9); m(maj7); m7(b5); dim; maj ‘stop’
• 20 alternative drum grooves/drum fills in every style in addition to the main drum groove

• All loops are offered royalty-free and can be used freely in your own works

pt.description:
Create professional quality jazz tracks to your own chords in minutes with this brand new edition of the award-winning SessionBand jazz app featuring exclusive, royalty-free, chord-based loops performed by 4 of the world's top jazz musicians: Jason Rebello (Piano); Jeremy Stacey (Drums); Patrick Clahar (Sax) and Geoff Gascoyne (Bass).

Volume 4 is the ultimate jazz play-along and the perfect tool for jazz songwriters. And we have added loads of extra features and tech improvements since Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Here's what you get:

1. 15 chord variations per root note! From straight major and minors right through to the most exotic jazz chords
2. 20 alternative drum grooves/fills in each style
3. Free access to over 150 downloadable jazz standards ready to play along to in any key!
4. Instant PDF chord sheets for the tracks you create
5. New tech enhancements like 'Track Builder' to make the workflow even faster.

With over 15,000 precision-cut, chord-based loops included in the download, the app instantly converts the chords you select into great sounding, royalty-free audio - wherever you are and whatever your ability.

For this long-awaited edition, we have gone back to mostly classic jazz with a couple of contemporary styles. Among the classics, expect to hear medium, post-bop Wayne Shorter swing styles in four and three, plus Wes Montgomery and Ahmad Jamal-inspired up-tempo swing styles. There's a contemporary Brad Mehldau-type piano and string style in 5/4 and a wonderful carnival-like worldbeat Cuban number with many rich, melodic tenor sax loops to choose from.

pt.description:
彩云天气Pro(无广告版）是基于气象雷达图，利用人工智能算法进行分钟级降水预报的全球先驱者。
「分钟级降水预报」
两小时内超准的分钟级降水预报，及时调整自己和家人的出行计划。
「全方位天气提醒」
无论是你的当前位置，还是收藏的地址，降水时间、预警信息、天气早晚报都支持自定义订阅！
「全球气象雷达动图」
700部气象雷达构建的AI预报网络，让你随时随刻都能看到实时的降水动态。
「全国空气质量动图」
凉风起天末，雾霾意如何？等风来的闲暇时光，不如看看雾霾的走势。
「台风实时追踪」
每个台风都有一个美丽的名字，年年来此，却上演着不同的故事：强度、路径、生命史……
「街道级定位」
都说气象万千，那每条街道、小区也值得专属的天气预报！
「我要反馈天气」
预报错了就来吐槽！狠狠戳下反馈天气，帮助改进人工智能预报模型，一起来提高预报准确率！

1. 服务名称：svip 连续包月, svip 连续包年。
2. 价格： 9 元 / 月, 90 元 / 年。

6. 用户协议: https://caiyunapp.com/h5/agreement/vipprotocal.html
